delectAction: A deletion operation will be performed. Do you wish to continue?
monthDataPrompt: Triggered when the monthly network usage traffic of the SIM card in the current billing cycle reaches **MB
monthSmsPrompt: Triggered when the monthly SMS usage of the SIM card in the current billing cycle reaches **messages
monthVoicePrompt: Triggered when the monthly Voice usage of the SIM card in the current billing cycle reaches **minutes
simStatusPrompt: Triggered when the status of the SIM card changes
overflowPrompt: Triggered when the SIM card runs out of monthly data in the current billing period
expirePrompt: Triggered when the SIM card package expires
httpPrompt: Note: No certificate needs to be uploaded for HTTP requests; in the HTTPS docking scenario, the server certificate can be uploaded (it needs to be re-uploaded after the certificate's validity period expires); if there is no port in the push URL, add the default port 80.
actionDestMessage: The push URL cannot be empty
ruleNameMessage: The rule name cannot be empty
objTypeMessage: The object type cannot be empty
sendMessageUrl: Send an API message to the URL
triggerCountPh1: Please enter the threshold for triggering a reminder
triggerCountPh: Please enter the threshold for triggering a reminder on the {index} occasion
noAction: This rule contains SIM card and cannot be modified or deleted
